about.title: About
about.text:
I'm Baptiste Marcon, a passionate Front-End developer specializing in interactive and user-friendly experiences. I'm constantly exploring new technologies and trends in web development.

Currently working at NEHS Digital, I have gained a strong expertise in Front-End development. I'm open to new opportunities to collaborate on interesting projects. Feel free to browse my portfolio to discover my recent projects. Contact me for collaboration or if you have any questions, I'll be delighted to connect with you.
